name: Verify EXCEL File Reader for default file

statusDetails.message: The supplied data appears to be in the Office 2007+ XML. You are calling the part of POI that deals with OLE2 Office Documents. You need to call a different part of POI to process this data (eg XSSF instead of HSSF)
statusDetails.trace:
